instructions.name: add_juror_stake
docs: Add more stake to juror account

accounts.name: defender_pool
docs: Optional: defender pool if subject is linked

accounts.name: pool_owner_defender_record
docs: Optional: DefenderRecord for pool owner (required if pool has stake to transfer)

instructions.name: add_to_stake
docs: Add stake to a standalone subject

accounts.name: dispute
docs: Optional: Active dispute (required if subject has active dispute in proportional mode)

accounts.name: protocol_config
docs: Protocol config for treasury address (required if proportional dispute)

accounts.name: treasury
docs: Treasury receives fees (required if proportional dispute)

instructions.name: add_to_vote
docs: Add more stake to an existing vote

instructions.name: claim_juror_reward
docs: Claim juror reward for correct vote

instructions.name: claim_restorer_refund
docs: Claim restorer refund for failed restoration request

instructions.name: create_free_subject
docs: Create a free subject (no stake required, just Subject account)

instructions.name: create_linked_subject
docs: Create a subject linked to a defender pool

instructions.name: create_pool
docs: Create a defender pool with initial stake

instructions.name: initialize_config
docs: Initialize protocol config (one-time setup by deployer)

instructions.name: register_juror
docs: Register as a juror with initial stake

instructions.name: resolve_dispute
docs: Resolve a dispute after voting period ends

instructions.name: stake_pool
docs: Add stake to an existing pool

instructions.name: submit_dispute
docs: Submit a new dispute against a subject (first challenger)

accounts.name: defender_pool
docs: Optional: defender pool if subject is linked

accounts.name: pool_owner_defender_record
docs: Optional: DefenderRecord for pool owner (required if pool has stake to transfer)

instructions.name: submit_free_dispute
docs: Submit a free dispute (no bond required, just Dispute account)

instructions.name: submit_restore
docs: Submit a restoration request against an invalidated subject
Restorations allow community to reverse previous invalidation decisions
Restorer stakes (no bond required), voting period is 2x previous

instructions.name: unregister_juror
docs: Unregister juror and withdraw all available stake

instructions.name: vote_on_dispute
docs: Vote on a dispute with stake allocation

instructions.name: vote_on_restore
docs: Vote on a restoration with stake allocation
ForRestoration = vote to restore subject to Valid
AgainstRestoration = vote to keep subject Invalidated

errors.name: RestoreStakeBelowMinimum
errors.msg: Restore stake below minimum (must match previous dispute total)

errors.name: NotARestore
errors.msg: This dispute is not a restoration request

errors.name: DisputeAlreadyExists
errors.msg: Dispute already exists for this subject

errors.name: ClaimsNotComplete
errors.msg: Not all claims have been processed

types.name: ChallengerAccount
docs: Challenger account tracking reputation - global per wallet

fields.name: disputes_upheld
docs: Disputes that were upheld (challenger was correct)

fields.name: disputes_dismissed
docs: Disputes that were dismissed (challenger was wrong)

types.name: ChallengerRecord
docs: Individual challenger's contribution to a dispute
Supports cumulative disputes where multiple challengers contribute

fields.name: dispute
docs: The dispute this record belongs to

fields.name: bond
docs: Bond amount contributed by this challenger

types.name: DefenderPool
docs: Defender's pool that can back multiple subjects - global per wallet

fields.name: subject_count
docs: Number of subjects linked to this pool

fields.name: pending_disputes
docs: Number of pending disputes against subjects in this pool

types.name: DefenderRecord
docs: Individual defender's contribution to backing a subject
Supports cumulative staking where multiple defenders back a subject

fields.name: subject
docs: The subject this record belongs to

fields.name: stake
docs: Total amount staked to back the subject (on subject account)

fields.name: stake_in_escrow
docs: Amount of stake currently at risk in escrow (during active dispute)
This is the amount that will be used for claim calculations

fields.name: stake_held
docs: Stake held from pool (match mode, linked subjects)

fields.name: direct_stake_held
docs: Stake held from direct stakers on subject (match mode)

fields.name: voting_started
docs: Whether voting has started (match mode waits for matching)

fields.name: voting_starts_at
docs: Voting start timestamp (0 if not started)

fields.name: voting_ends_at
docs: Voting end timestamp (0 if not started)

fields.name: snapshot_total_stake
docs: Snapshot of subject's total_stake at dispute creation

fields.name: snapshot_defender_count
docs: Snapshot of subject's defender_count at dispute creation

fields.name: challengers_claimed
docs: Number of challengers who have claimed their reward/refund

fields.name: defenders_claimed
docs: Number of direct defenders who have claimed their reward/refund

fields.name: is_restore
docs: True if this dispute is a restoration request (reverses the meaning of outcomes)

fields.name: restore_stake
docs: Stake posted by restorer (for restorations only)

fields.name: restorer
docs: Restorer's pubkey (for restorations only, used for refunds)

fields.name: details_cid
docs: Details CID for restoration requests (stored here since no ChallengerRecord)

types.name: JurorAccount
docs: - `total_stake`: Total SOL held in this PDA (actual lamports)
- `available_stake`: SOL available to vote or withdraw
SOL only transfers on deposit/withdraw. Voting is accounting only.

fields.name: total_stake
docs: Total stake held in this PDA (actual lamports)

fields.name: available_stake
docs: Available stake (not locked in active disputes)

types.name: ProtocolConfig
docs: Stores treasury address and admin authority for fee collection

fields.name: authority
docs: Admin who can update config (deployer initially)

types.name: RestoreVoteChoice
docs: Vote choice for restorations (separate enum for clearer semantics)

types.name: Subject
docs: Subject that defenders back - global (identified by subject_id)

fields.name: subject_id
docs: Subject identifier (could be PDA from external program)

fields.name: defender_pool
docs: Optional defender pool (default = standalone mode, set = linked to pool)

fields.name: details_cid
docs: Details/metadata CID (IPFS/Arweave) - context provided by first staker

fields.name: available_stake
docs: Available stake for disputes (direct stakes + pool contribution when disputed)

fields.name: max_stake
docs: Max stake at risk per dispute (for match mode)

fields.name: voting_period
docs: Voting period in seconds for this subject's disputes

fields.name: dispute_count
docs: Number of disputes (for sequential dispute PDAs)

fields.name: match_mode
docs: Match mode: true = bond must match stake, false = proportionate

fields.name: free_case
docs: Free case mode: no stake/bond required, no rewards, no reputation impact

fields.name: last_dispute_total
docs: Previous dispute's (stake + bond) - minimum stake required for restoration

fields.name: last_voting_period
docs: Previous dispute's voting period - restorations use 2x this value

fields.name: restore_choice
docs: Vote choice for restorations (only used when is_restore_vote is true)

fields.name: is_restore_vote
docs: Whether this is a restoration vote

fields.name: reputation_processed
docs: Whether reputation has been processed after resolution
